definition: big/huge/large/major/great/wide/deep/older (than)/oldest/eldest/greatly/very much/(dialect) father/father's elder or younger brother
gas/air/smell/weather/to make angry/to annoy/to get angry/vital energy/qi

pinyin: da4 qi4 ceng2 he2 shi4 yan4

sentences.english: This is sunlight refracted through our atmosphere.
sentences.chinese: 這些是從地球大氣層中折射出的光線。

sentences.english: Oxygen, nitrogen and carbon monoxide molecules drift into the upper atmosphere, where solar radiation ionizes them.
sentences.chinese: 分子飄到大氣層上部時，會受太陽輻射而遊離。

sentences.english: Looking through the atmosphere is somewhat like looking through a piece of old, stained glass.
sentences.chinese: 透過大氣層觀測有些像透過一片老舊的有色玻璃。

sentences.english: When a meteoroid enters the atmosphere, it compresses the air in front of it.
sentences.chinese: 當流星體進入大氣層，它壓縮的空氣在前面的。

sentences.english: Nitrogen gas is emitted into the atmosphere by cars and industrial processes.
sentences.chinese: 汽車和工業生產過程把含氮氣體排放到了大氣層中。

sentences.english: The trouble is that Earth - bound telescopes must look through the Earth's atmosphere.
sentences.chinese: 但問題在於，地面望遠鏡的觀測必須穿越大氣層。

sentences.english: One class of white dwarfs has almost pure helium atmospheres.
sentences.chinese: 有一類白矮星的大氣層幾乎完全由純氦氣構成。

sentences.english: The probe was the first to sample the atmosphere of a gas planet.
sentences.chinese: 該探測器第一次在木星這個氣體行星的大氣層裏採樣。

sentences.english: The space shuttle has reentered the Earth's atmosphere.
sentences.chinese: 航天飛機現已重返地球大氣層。

sentences.english: An Ancient Storm in the Jovian Atmosphere.
sentences.chinese: 大紅斑是木星大氣層中一個古老的風暴。

sentences.english: Volcanism recycles the carbonates into the atmosphere.
sentences.chinese: 火山作用使碳酸鹽重新返回大氣層中。

sentences.english: This is the biggest contraction of the thermosphere in at least 43 years.
sentences.chinese: 這是至少在43年中最大的熱大氣層收縮。

sentences.english: Each car belching out fumes into the atmosphere.
sentences.chinese: 每一輛小車冒着髒煙，直飄入大氣層。

sentences.english: The Venusian atmosphere is too thick.
Therefore, the  atmosphere is merely a  sphere.
sentences.chinese: 因此大氣層只不過是一個球體。

sentences.english: The spacecraft burned up when it re-entered the earth's atmosphere.
sentences.chinese: 宇宙飛船重新進入地球大氣層時燒燬了。

definition: asteroid belt between Mars and Jupiter
Lop Nor, salt lake and nuclear testing site in Xinjiang
Europa (moon of Jupiter), aka Jupiter II
